description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
test period containing different test sessions and which was repeated within 60 days
duration the participant was occupied with investigating food
whether the food was eaten or tasted – sometimes partially
latency in second it took participant to touch a novel food
food type presented to the participant -  normal / novel
food type of the novel food - natural / artificial
particular type of food presented to the participant – normal = apple / grape / banana / novel natural = green star/ red star etc. / novel artificial = brown marsh/ yellow marsh etc.
whether the participant rejected food or not
latencies of food taken measured - those trials where no food was taken were set to max test time of 60 secs
